Uses of Class
jproductioncritic.errorcheckers.ErrorChecker

  • Packages that use ErrorChecker 
    Package Description
    jproductioncritic  
    jproductioncritic.errorcheckers  

    • Uses of ErrorChecker in jproductioncritic

      Methods in jproductioncritic that return types with arguments of type ErrorChecker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<ErrorChecker> JProductionCritic.getAllErrorCheckers(ConfigurationSettings preferences)
      Return a list containing one instance of each implemented ErrorChecker sub-class.
      Method parameters in jproductioncritic with type arguments of type ErrorChecker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String ReportBuilder.generateWekaArffFile(java.util.ArrayList<ErrorReport> errors, java.util.ArrayList<ErrorChecker> error_checkers_applied)
      Returns a string containing the contents of a Weka ARFF file detailing the detected errors for a single analyzed audio file.
      static java.lang.String ConfigurationSettings.validateConfigurationSettings(java.util.ArrayList<ErrorChecker> error_checkers)
      Verify that the given ErrorCheckers each have their fields set to values that are valid (needs to be done because the user may have inadvertently have caused the fields to have invalid values due to invalid settings entered in the configuration settings file).
      Constructor parameters in jproductioncritic with type arguments of type ErrorChecker 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationSettings(java.lang.String[][] new_settings, java.util.ArrayList<ErrorChecker> error_checkers)
      Instantiate a new ConfigurationSettings object based on the settings specified in the given String array.
      ConfigurationSettings(java.lang.String config_file_path, java.util.ArrayList<ErrorChecker> error_checkers, java.io.PrintStream warning_stream)
      Instantiate a new ConfigurationSettings object based on the settings specified in the given jProductionCritic configurations file.

    • Uses of ErrorChecker in jproductioncritic.errorcheckers

      Subclasses of ErrorChecker in jproductioncritic.errorcheckers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DCBias
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any errors that are found associated with a DC bias.
      class  DigitalClipping
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with digital clipping.
      class  Duration
      This class is used to report any errors that are found associated with recordings that are too long or too short.
      class  EditClick
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with edit clicks.
      class  EncodingQuality
      This class is used to report any errors that are found associated with encoding quality.
      class  GroundLoopHum
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with ground loop hums.
      class  InstantaneousNoise
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with instantaneous noise.
      class  InsufficientDynamicRange
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with an insufficiently large dynamic range.
      class  InsufficientDynamicRangeCompression
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any errors that are found associated with a signal that has too much variation in dynamics.
      class  InsufficientVarietyInDynamics
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any errors that are found associated with an insufficiently high variety in dynamics.
      class  IsNotStereo
      This class is used to report any errors that are found associated with recordings that are not stereo.
      class  LongSilence
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with overly long silences.
      class  NarrowbandNoise
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with narrowband background noise.
      class  Phasing
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with phasing.
      class  StereoChannelBalance
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any errors that are found associated with an uneven overall loudness balance between the two stereo channels.
      class  StereoChannelSimilarity
      This class is used to examine audio samples and report any technical errors that are found associated with too much similarity between stereo channels.
